title.heading: GOD LOVES YOU AND CREATED YOU TO KNOW HIM PERSONALLY. HE HAS A WONDERFUL PLAN FOR YOUR LIFE.

panel.text: "For God so loved the world that He gave His one and only Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish but have eternal life."
"Now this is eternal life: that they may know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom you have sent."

page.question: What prevents us from knowing God personally?
